product_name: adidas Terrex Fast R Low Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: Move fast on the mountain in the men's adidas Terrex Fast R Low Hiking Shoes. They feature TRAXION(TM) outsoles with Continental(TM) rubber for optimal grip on rugged terrain. Low-to-the-ground construction is supported by a new 3D FORMOTION(R) unit for great stability on rough terrain. High-abrasion mesh and synthetic upper materials provide breathability and durability. ADIPRENE(R)+ in the forefoot maintains propulsion and efficiency. OrthoLite(R) odor-resistant moisture-wicking sockliner. TRAXION(TM) outsole provides the best grip and agility during fast activities; Continental(TM) rubber for optimal grip in wet conditions. Speed lacing construction allows fast and snug lacing.
short_description: Move fast on the mountain in the men's adidas Terrex Fast R Low Hiking Shoes. They feature TRAXION(TM) outsoles with Continental(TM) rubber for optimal grip on rugged terrain.
